name: physical
content: Have you gotten your yearly physical?

name: skin
content: Have you gotten a skin check recently? (Especially if you regularly tan)

name: phone
content: Do you know all the details of your cell phone plan?

name: creditScore
content: Do you know you current credit score?

name: firstAid
content: Do you currently have a first-aid kit in your home?

name: flashlight
content: Do you have a flashlight in case of a power outage?
